website_summaries.verdict: Logitech's revised version of its already distinctive G15 gaming keyboard adds polish and trims some of the fat. Throw in the now-mature user community that churns out lots of homebrew apps for the built-in LCD screen, and we'd recommend this keyboard to any PC gamer as a unique, useful, and customizable input device.
pros: Refined design takes up less space than the original but keeps most of the same features
broader support for homebrew LCD apps
orange LED comes through better in the dark

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard, but their software sucks and is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Good keyboard, but their software sucks and is not compatible with today's O/S but will still work without the software. What's the point, if you are gaming you need your macros. This is just going to slow you down. My first grievance was the keyboard tilt swing legs to give you a 33 degree tilt they broke off near as soon as I got it. Customer service said I would have to buy another keyboard that they would not sell those snap in plastic pieces individually. poor support... and so on. USB ports on rear of display are 2.0. clearly a legacy board. buy something newer.
customer_reviews.author: furious in AL

customer_reviews.title: Excellent build and function
customer_reviews.text: 10 years later I still have this keyboard and it still works. Multiple function and macro keys. Kinda bulky, it's a little longer than I'd like as it does not fit my keyboard/mouse tray with a mouse on it. Orange lights are meh
customer_reviews.author: Hieu T Tran

customer_reviews.title: Smooth Typing, and More
customer_reviews.text: PROs: Smooth key presses, perfect ammount of click and resistance for typing and gaming Strong community for LCD panel applets 6 G keys are enough for this MMO and FPS player The orange light is soothing on the eyes in pure darkness LCD panel is very clear and readable, has reverse light function for those who can't read it well on standard mode. CONS: No color change option (luckily my G9 mouse can match the board) When you sit back from the keyboard the keys aren't fully illuminated USB 1.0 instead of 2.0 LCD applets may or may not be compatible with "old" version G15 and with both having the same name can cause some confusion
customer_reviews.author: it's all gone to the dogs

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard for nearly 5 years. I play a ton of video games and have given this thing a lot of key smashing. All the keys are still in perfect shape with none of them wearing off. It feels great when typing and is all around very comfortable. I don't use the macro keys very often, but they work great when I do. This has been an extremely durable keyboard, all my friends use the same model and have zero problems. I can't recommend this keyboard enough. Great for gamers or just the average internet surfer. A++
customer_reviews.author: tyler

customer_reviews.title: Complement your Monster-Machine
customer_reviews.text: ...because it definitely complements mine! It's nice to know that at a push of a button, you can see game stats, your GPU temperature, Framerate, and Computer Performance! I was originally using a 2nd monitor to do that using EVGA Precision and Windows Sidebar, but this keyboard and it's LCD display made that redundant (plus I save more power with one less monitor and my GFX card not jumping to full clocking speeds all the time!) Mainly bought it for the LCD feature, some of the buttons I don't even use but I still love it to pieces! A must have for all you gamer-nerds out there!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Second buy
customer_reviews.text: I have this keyboard now and I've owned it since 2008. I recently decided I'd do the deepest clean on it that I've ever done. When doing so I broke the GD spacebar. Sonova! I wasn't sure if I wanted to spend that amount of money to rebuy this keyboard when I realized that I've had it for ALMOST 6 YEARS! WOW. I went ahead and re-bought it and also picked up something with I hope will help me fix my spacebar so that way I'll have a new one in case I can't fix it :( And if I can, then I'm almost as freaking awesome as this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it in. Downloaded drivers from [...]. Works great no issue! Has nice tactile feel. Lighting effects are useful as I typically don't have any direct lighting in the room. I thought that the LCD panel was mostly a gimmick, but I found that I use it quite a bit while playing World of Warcraft. My only negative comment: occasionally, I hit the wrong key as it's layout seems a little cramped on the left side. I think I'll adjust to it with long term use though. I don't know that this is a problem, per se. It's just different the the Dell keyboard I use at work.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E. From Texas

customer_reviews.title: G15 Rev. 002
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -Silent Keystrokes -Backlit -6 function keys with three groups (M1,M2,M3) per profile -Lots of profiles available -Nice macro recorder for quick logins -LCD screen is nice with iTunes -LCD screen works well with temps and cpu/mem usage Cons: -Orange backlight -backlight could be brighter -USB 1.1 Ports on the keyboard -LCD Software Stops working sometimes (simple restart of the software usually fixes it) Cons are mainly preferences in my case. I prefer a blue backlight with greater intensity. However, the USB 1.1 ports are a con, but then again most people have tons of USB 2.0 ports and HUBS nowadays. I haven't had a problem with the LCD software in quite some time. 4.5/5 But I'll round up.
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: SUCH a useful gaming keyboard for Arma2/3
customer_reviews.text: SO needed this many G keys for the massive operations I do with the 21st Army Rangers on Arma3. Makes communications and player movements SO much faster and easier on the fly after programming, not to mention the fact I added a few things through MSI Afterburner to keep an eye on CPU, GPU and RAM functions through the LCD screen.
customer_reviews.author: LMB Motorsports

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love this keyboard. I'm typing this review on it! I got it for gaming, specifically for the short cut buttons on the side. I don't use those as much, but I do like the fact tha it's back lit and that it has a clock in the console which can be useful when playing games. Plus controls for media player and mute which works great when playing music. You can also turn off the back lite if necessary. Great all purpose board, but spendy if you don't use the game features.
customer_reviews.author: Cherston68

customer_reviews.title: Sweet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second M15 keyboard. (The first one simply wore out from use!) I would have bought the newer one except for the ridiculous price! This keyboard does everything I want it to. Has a good feel. Just right for casual to serious gaming. Would buy again! NOTE: When I first received the keyboard, the one I got was defective, no cd, no wrist rest. The lights didn't work and neither did many of the keys. Amazon sent me a new one immediately, and I sent the defective one back. It was an easy exchange. TY Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Shayladane

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get used to this keyboard, due to the placement of the g keys. Once my fingers got used to the placement of the keys and I downloaded sidetunes to control iTunes, I loved this keyboard. The keys feel real nice. I love how it lights up. And I also love the on/off windows key. And the g keys are real cool. When a map is over in an FPS, all I do is press the key to bring up the talk and then hit my g key and it says gga. It's a real great keyboard. Also really great for typing since the keys have a rubberized feel to them.
customer_reviews.author: mwgfghost

customer_reviews.title: Works, but a little hard to see the key labels
customer_reviews.text: Keys are laid out exactly the same as a standard keyboard. But, the key labels are little small and the key lighting is a little too dim. The keys type well (I am not a serious typist). The keyboard works as a standard keyboard that can be used without installing drivers, and can be used during boot-up. The multimedia keys also work without installing drivers on a regular PC. The LCD display works exactly the same as the one on the Dell XPS 1730m. Loading the included software took over my XPS 1730m LCD software perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Warner II

customer_reviews.title: I liked the heads up display that would show your stats/etc
customer_reviews.text: Only reason I replaced this keyboard was because I purchased a mechanical keyboard. I liked the heads up display that would show your stats/etc. It saved you from having to switch to different menu's in the game. The letters eventually started to smear off but I don't blame the keyboard as I put plenty of use on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Guffey

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this keyboard, I was a little hesitant on buying it after reading reviews and some people said the keys were stiff or hard to push, I don't have this problem at all. I would consider myself a heavy gamer and i have not found any of the keys to be "wearing" or letters rubbing off like some have said. Screen works great, kinda cool the way it shows your stats on world of war-craft as well as who's talking on Ventrilo. Highly recommend this item and would purchase it again. Only complaint would be if they could of threw in a extra led color for the keys other then that awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Susan T

customer_reviews.title: I love this keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to install (as all logitech products!) the layout is beautiful, it is not too wide (the old G15 wouldn't fit my desk). The macro keys are easy to program and great to use! The backlight is a must have if you play FPS games! The LCD is much more useful than I expected! I played NWN2 and the character's stats are all printed there, saving me the trouble of pressing C and having half of my screen filled with information just because I wanted to check my hitpoints.
customer_reviews.author: Renato Prata De Frasson

customer_reviews.title: Still one of the best
customer_reviews.text: This version is definitely a downgrade from the previous generation G15; I have the original on my computer, and I bought this one recently for my wife's computer. The screen isn't nearly as nice and the keyboard and screen are smaller. It's still a fantastic keyboard (and a great value now, too, since Logitech's new model is out), but if you can find the original G15 reasonably priced, it's worth considering vs this one.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Benzakein

customer_reviews.title: Good Sturdy Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I used this keyboard for the better part of a year, before replacing it for a wireless one. It worked great as a regular keyboard for me, and the macro functions worked very well with Starcraft 2. Personally though I didn't find it to be useful enough to be worth the price you pay for it. However for those that will use all of it's special functions, it does what it was built to do very well.
customer_reviews.author: GriffMoDuo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have been gaming on this keyboard for 4 years now and it still works like a charm. Keys are backlit so they are easy to see in the dark. I never really found use for the macro keys but I do like that you can lock settings and toggle mute. The led display is also compatablew with Ventrillo, performance mnonitors and Games stats ( World of warcraft) Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Joe B

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good keyboard with a nice layout. The keys are slightly different so take some getting used to but they are pretty close to standard so not much getting used to. The keys are really responsive and good quality. One of the downsides is that the keyboard doesnt lift very high off the desk which can be annoying if you are used to typing on a raised keyboard like i am. The reason I only gave 4 stars is because the profiles and macros do not work correctly under win 7 and they dont intend on supporting the drivers for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jackson

customer_reviews.title: So soft, so dim..
customer_reviews.text: While this keyboard is visually appealing, (orange lit keys and display) the feel of the keys are too soft for my taste; the keys feel clunky and chunky, not at all what I look for when I type. I know it's a gaming keyboard, not designed with everyday typing in mind, but that's just my opinion. If you like a harder typing experience, do not get this keyboard. Also, the lighting is TERRIBLE. At the highest setting, it barely glows at all. Razors Blackwidow Mechanical Ultimate back-lit keyboard is a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Micheal Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my brother in december 2008. In the 2.5 years he has lived in Afghanistan for work twice and Buenos Aries once. He still uses this keyboard and says it runs great. The keyboard is a good buy, and while it is (arguably) not the best one out there, it is affordable and solid enough to last. I regret not purchasing one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Sambardo

customer_reviews.title: Good keyboard for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent keyboard, keys are not that loud but useable. Though fingerprint, natural skin oil is easily shown and smeared on the matte-fade keys, not to mention "after oily-face grabbing contact". Otherwise, great product and software a bit interesting, non bloat but required win-service on startup for keyboard display to work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_User

customer_reviews.title: Excellent keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I have had this keyboard for several years, and it still functions perfectly. It has really been put to the test. The adjustable lighting on the keys is great, and the lcd display is good for knowing which song is playing on your music player. The keys have just the right amount of pressure, and the macro keys are great for automating tasks for gaming or setting hotkeys. This is a real good keyboard. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! No more searching my Character tab for item durability! The light i think is fantastic.No problem with lag either. The only problem i had was figuring out that the new download (on the Logitech Website) was necessary for the Gaming LCD to work. Otherwise well worth the money. Great for WoW!
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Mom

customer_reviews.title: Easy playing
customer_reviews.text: Keyboard has nice feedback when typing or playing games. Additional USB connections convenant for iPod and camera for quick access. Long cable, allows for good fit on larger desk setups when PC is located farther away. Can't rate use/value of menu, limited usage as of today.
customer_reviews.author: 10,000 Lakes

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard for gaming and everyday activities
customer_reviews.text: I'll have this keyboard just under two months now. I love it! The illuminated keys make playing in the dark fun! You have the option to turn the lights off if you're using it during the day. Keys are quiet, and spaced evenly apart for easy typing. I could go on and on, I'll simply say this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Ventrilo - G15
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this keyboard specifically for the ability to see Ventrilo users speaking (information) in Windows Vista. There is not currently any alternative to allow Ventrlio to work in Vista (overlays and such). Also I game frequently, so it will come in handy otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Jared G.

customer_reviews.title: I've waited a long time...
customer_reviews.text: I finally splurged and got this product. I wanted it for a very long time because of all the programmable keys and the backlighting and the LCD screen. I have to say: The LCD screen is slightly lame. That being said... the keyboard is pretty amazing. I love the extra controls and the software that comes with it works well enough. It'll take some practice to figure out the macros if you've never done it before, but this kinda keyboard rocks for gamers!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... button mouseman for serial connection and so far i like it this board is a bit out of style ...
customer_reviews.text: Always used logitech since the 3 button mouseman for serial connection and so far i like it this board is a bit out of style but types comfortably and works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Crow

customer_reviews.title: my  second  one
customer_reviews.text: I really don't use all bells and whistles.. only wanted an illuminated key board.. I can only guess what its capable of... have two pc's with dual monitors and it works great for my needs..
customer_reviews.author: Bob b

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting Logitech
customer_reviews.text: My wife got this for me 6 years ago and I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: G15 gaming Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I still like PC gaming over console and the Logiteck G15 gaming keyboard is as important as having a presion mouse to play with. I'm amazed of the data it provides at a glance for the majority of the games I play. A must have if you're a serious computer gamer
customer_reviews.author: Longtime Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great - price was good too!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do a lot of shopping around so I don't know if it was a 5-star, but my son (21) needed a new keyboard and he's a gamer and said this one met his criteria. He's been happy with it and mentioned the display on it was a real plus. He's not around to give the review -- I just paid for it -- so hope this helps those considering a gaming keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Macoke

customer_reviews.title: Very Dim Backlighting
customer_reviews.text: The Keyboard itself, and the nice little lcd display are great...only thing is, the backlighting is so dim you can not see the keys with lights off. So, if backlighting is not important to you, its a nice keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: g dean

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Best keyboard on the market for gaming i believe, the lcd panel and all the software features you can get on it to display temperatures, information in ventrilo, compatible games is nuts! I had one before i purchased this again, i dropped my desk ontop of it and the back that keeps it tilted forward had broke. Had to buy again because how much i love this keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Asycient

customer_reviews.title: Good Keyboard, well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I kinda got cheated by amazon because i placed the order when it cost $60, then i for some reason i had to place it again a few days later and it cost $80. Despite the price, the keyboard is exactly the same, a decent keyboard for anyone, havent really found a use for the macro keys yet tho.
customer_reviews.author: S. Baulch

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaming Keyboard, but the Older Version  was Better
customer_reviews.text: Since owning the older G15 gaming keyboard (version 1) for quite some time now, I would rate this newer G15 lower, as it has much less programmable macro keys and the color scheme is not as appealing as the older v.1. All the functions are the same, but much less of them. If you can get a hold of the version 1, the G15 with blue backlight keys, then consider yourself in luck as logitech as long discontinued them.
customer_reviews.author: Augie Masali

customer_reviews.title: Everything I want in a keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard doesn't fall short in any category. They keys are solid, not too loud and the there are just enough G keys for macros. Anyone would have to admit that the screen is not always useful, but the fact that there's a community of software writers serves to make that less and less true. (In particular, the Miranda IM client's G15 plugin is excellent and very useful for when you're playing a game or fullscreen movie.)
customer_reviews.author: Josiah D. Kiehl

customer_reviews.title: It was great. Until it got replaced.
customer_reviews.text: I'll say it worked fine for the time I owned it. Only thing that I miss is the screen, just cuz I could tell who had logged in to Vent and I could say hi. It's been replaced by a Razer Black Widow Ultimate (2013 Ed) and I'm not going back.
customer_reviews.author: MMachuca84

customer_reviews.title: compact keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Only been using it for a few days. First thing to note is that, the keyboard is not your average sized keyboard. It's a bit more compact. will take a little getting used to the feel of it. I didnt notice this mentioned in any reviews etc. Also didnt know this was the newer version with less macro buttons. Although I havent explored making macros yet, i would have hoped it had as many macro buttons as the old and well liked G15. Oh well...still a decent keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Akira

customer_reviews.title: Concave up bottom row (ctrl / alt / space) ruin Starcraft utility
customer_reviews.text: Not good for Starcraft. Every other key concaves downward, but the bottom row concaves upward. Typical way of setting Starcraft control groups (pinky on ctrl, index on a number) is difficult due to the concave up bottom row. It's also extremely noisy, considering how squishy the keys feel. For something this loud you should just go with a mechanical keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Jared R. Clement

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this keyboard because I wanted to upgrade my gaming hardware for a fairly cheap price. Well this ended up being wonderful! The lighted keys have made it easy to find a key in the dark and it works awesome with teamspeak! Bad Company 2, oh boy is it great, when playing a squad death match it displays a load of information on its little screen, kills, deaths, rations, points, servername, map name, all in a little click of a single button. This keyboard is amazing for its cheap price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike__MRM

customer_reviews.title: G15 Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: The G15 is a great Logitech product. They fixed a lot of the problems with the first one such as the bulkiness. There is no more flip screen and they changed from a bright blue to a orange that is easier on the eyes. Only 6 G keys and 3 sets you can save it to so it should be called a G6 or G18 keyboard if you ask me. Types great. This is second one I bought old version and new and I wouldn't consider a different keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. The lighted keyboard with a cover I purchases elsewhere will not have the letters fade and come off. Will last indefinitely.
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie Chyten

customer_reviews.title: W.o.W
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are huge gamers and we love this! Especially when we play world of warcraft.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley P.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is like a computer keyboard for your computer. Does so many different things like macros and keeping track of processor usage my gaming son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Real Jeep

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my son who is a big gamer...he loves this keyboard and I would order it again...received quickly and was very pleased..thank you
customer_reviews.author: D. Legendre

customer_reviews.title: the best keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Best in its class for gaming some might prefer mechanical, havent tried them yet though. Ah maybe someday, but for now this IS THE BOARD TO HAVE!!!:)
customer_reviews.author: Warlord Greebo

customer_reviews.title: OldGamer
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard works fine, but as for playing games my old one did just as well. What I really don't like is if I had waited a couple of days I could have purchased it for $40 less.
customer_reviews.author: E. Kunkle

customer_reviews.title: it doesnt get any better
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this keyboard! Nothing else I have ever used has ever been this good!!!! I recommend it for sure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Best keyboard I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: LCD display is a must for all gamers. Recommend using SirReal panel to view CPU/Memory/Upload/Download/Time/Date all at a glance at any time. Can't live without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Frosty

customer_reviews.title: Logitech
customer_reviews.text: I've been in love with the Logitech gaming keyboards since they first came out. This one is a good quality and if your looking for a rugged gaming keyboard, you found it.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: OK Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Miss the larger display on older G15 but orange lights are great. Get CVS plugin for Winamp and lights will blink to music.
customer_reviews.author: Rickey D. Carter

customer_reviews.title: good keyboard
customer_reviews.text: the new G15 is a good keyboard, its comfortable and works in any light. thats good for me. I would recommend it highly
customer_reviews.author: woodman

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The Logitech G15 is the best keyboard that I have ever owned. After just a few weeks of having it, I have noticed a whole different way of playing games with the built in macros, light up keys, and the lcd screen. I recommend this product to everyone who needs a new keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: tman5890

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15 Keyboard - Version 2
customer_reviews.text: Overall excellent. Only thing I wish is a different illuminating color since the orange color doesn't match the rest of my computer. Excellent for gaming!
customer_reviews.author: T. Phan

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15 Gaming Keyboard (Black)
customer_reviews.text: I have no complain about this keyboard.I recommend to anyone want to have a keyboard with a light, specially when you have your computer in the corner and doesn't have that much light...and when you want to type something...It's perfect! Quit and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Very good Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Owned the original G15 loved it also was just so large, this one is a good bit smaller the lcd screen is brighter then what I expected and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: C. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Computer keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Logitech is one of the best in the market. Recommend this to all ages.
customer_reviews.author: GARY LOVE

customer_reviews.title: Great Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: This older model is still one of the best gaming keyboards around. I really love the little led screen at the top. Just make sure you don't spill soda on it.
customer_reviews.author: Brienne

customer_reviews.title: Buy this keyboard for gaming!
customer_reviews.text: I play many online games. If you are like me and are always in Ventrilo, game, and a few other programs like Xfire, then get this keyboard! Saves you from alt-tabbing ever again. One of the most used upgrades I ever purchased.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramey

customer_reviews.title: Here is your gaming steal!
customer_reviews.text: No complaints for gaming with this product. It's smaller than I thought it would be. The buttons are punchy, which I like. The added features are slightly dated but still applicable. If the price of this keeps coming down, it's a steal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Spahr

customer_reviews.title: Always read the fine print on anything you buy used...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this used and was a little disappointed that I had to remap the keys. I didn't read the fine print. Remampping was a pain. Had to find the website ect... Otherwise the keyboard was great!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Perry

customer_reviews.title: Water kills!
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this board until two droplets of water from the condensation on a glass landed between the keys and instantly killed it.
customer_reviews.author: FlashLight

customer_reviews.title: New drivers make this work!
customer_reviews.text: Previous versions of the drivers ate a lot of memory and were hard to configure. The new gaming console makes programming and feature selection much easier. After 3 years of HARD gaming everything is still working and the keys have not lost their response.
customer_reviews.author: CompGeek

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: everything went perfect, the shippment and the product were just as expected and i have nothing to complain about. the keyboard is the dream of every player in the world and i have to say im really trilled by it.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro Lara

customer_reviews.title: G15 is a dream
customer_reviews.text: very nice keyboard, small compared with the other G keyboard from logitech, i consider this keyboard a dream! very good and customized LCD screen to show some information related to the game / music you are playing and may be to your hardware temperature too !
customer_reviews.author: Fadi Radwan Soufi

customer_reviews.title: GREAT feel - just needs instructions
customer_reviews.text: I tested dozens of keyboards before I settled on this one. It's comfortable and a great type "feel". My only complaint is that there are no instructions for programming in the box. Awesome keyboard!
customer_reviews.author: creepy pink rat

customer_reviews.title: COOL
customer_reviews.text: Cool Looking keyboard. Honestly made of quality. I am very brand loyal to Logitech, and will continue to purchase their products. Im done with Microsoft(cheap).
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Campobasso

customer_reviews.title: Excelent Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Very good Keyboard ,easy work macros, very good for rest wrist , very nice ilumination for dark room . At a disadvantage is that the pulsation of the keys is less sensitive to usual Very fast send for amazon.com
customer_reviews.author: Jefferdson D. Flores M

customer_reviews.title: Aewsome Key Board
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this keyboard are the macros! The macro profiles automatically change when you launch programs. Works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: K. McCormick

customer_reviews.title: Over 6 months with no problems
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting to write a review till i actually knew whether the keyboard would last. It has been over 6 months now without a single problem with the keyboard, I would recommend this product to others.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is nice and the buttons seem to work as advertised. I only wish that it was available with more than one color backlight (orange, btw)
customer_reviews.author: R. T. Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this keyboard rocks. The keys are lit very weell for nighttime gaming/typing. The "apps" on the display are very useful and easy to manage and see. There is really nothing I can say bad about this thing. Just buy one, its worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Harmsen

customer_reviews.title: This Item Is Liked Alot!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for someone else in 2008. They loved it then and still do. They have not had any problems with it. He and I do recommend it! Submitted by: Kelly Woodcox
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Love this keyboard, would buy it again without a question. Love the product, easy to use product and software. Can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Logitech G15 Gaming Keyboard (Black)
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this keyboard for quite a while. It works for me! I have two of them. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Nadeau

customer_reviews.title: Get the G15 Gaming Keyboard Instead
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but the shrunken LCD is disappointing compared to the larger and bluer predecessor. Otherwise it is the quality you would expect from Logitech and is a good choice if you want to conserve desk space. The amber is a little more up to date as well.
customer_reviews.author: Phares Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: i am very happy with amazon got it before christmas even thou i didnt order it till almost a week before christmas and my keyboard is amazing
customer_reviews.author: M. Morelan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great price
customer_reviews.text: My teenager was thrilled to get this for Christmas... Shopped it before hand. Felt like we got a really good deal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Person

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great keyboard,my husband loves it . I bouight the keyboard for his birthday it was just as they discribed very nice quality .The lights are not only good for gaming,he uses them all the time .Well worth the purchase price and free shipping is a bonus
customer_reviews.author: Billie J. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: WARNING - Keyboard you get is NOT what is pictured.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is -NOT- what is being shown in the picture. They're passing it off as if it's the older version of the G15 but it's not. It's the re-released version which is actually A LOT bigger and doesn't even fit in my keyboard tray in my desk. The keyboard pictured has 6 programmable gaming keys. The one pictured has 18 of them making the keyboard WAY bigger than I wanted it to be or need it to be. The original G15 keyboard is what I wanted. It's better and a DECENT sized keyboard. Very frustrated with how deceiving the pictures are. Why are they allowed to post pictures that do not match with the product being sold?
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Bustamante

customer_reviews.title: I kind of liked the older G15 better.
customer_reviews.text: Lights are not bright enough. LCD attracts dust and dirt like heck. Keys are rather loud for a keyboard. LCD screen on keyboard is more of a novelty than actual help, only real use I have found for it is World of Warcraft Battlegrounds. Hand rest can mess up your wrists. Not enough Marco Keys.
customer_reviews.author: Tech

customer_reviews.title: My Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: He especially likes the LCD display and the macro key capability. Arrived on schedule, in time for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: James Rockford

customer_reviews.title: Bad condition
customer_reviews.text: The product was not as described and was in terrible condition and partially damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Landon Williams

product_meta.title: Logitech G15 Gaming Keyboard (Black)
product_meta.description:
Good intel and the proper gear are the keys to victory, even in gaming. The Logitech G15 keyboard keeps you informed and outfitted to win. With the Logitech-exclusive GamePanel LCD, you can easily find out what server your friends are using to play Battlefield 2142, or receive notification when your World of Warcraft battleground becomes available. You can even identify who s speaking in Ventrilo. Create useful macros on the fly and play them back with a single press of a G-key. Illuminated characters allow you to play late into the night.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
From the Manufacturer 

Good intel and the proper gear are the keys to victory, even in gaming. The Logitech® G15 keyboard keeps you informed and outfitted to win. 

With the Logitech-exclusive GamePanel™ LCD, you can easily find out what server your friends are using to play Battlefield 2142™, or receive notification when your World of Warcraft® battleground becomes available. You can even identify who’s speaking in Ventrilo™. Create useful macros on the fly and play them back with a single press of a G-key. Backlighted keyboard allows you to play late into the night. 

The Logitech® G15 gives you a winning advantage, and everyone knows it’s more fun when you win.

High-visibility GamePanel™ LCD: Displays game stats and other important system information. Backlit keyboard: Choose from three levels of brightness. Locate keys easily in both bright and low-light conditions. Six programmable G-keys: Perform single keystrokes or complex macros with six fully programmable G-keys. Create macros on the fly, without having to pause the action. Intelligent cable management: Keep mouse, headset, and other cords out of the way by routing them through channels on the underside of the keyboard. Instant media access: Use the convenient one-touch controls for volume and media playback. Detachable palmrest: Can be used with or without palmrest, depending upon user's preference SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
 * Windows® XP, Windows Vista™ 
 * 256 MB RAM 
 * 20 MB available hard disk space 
 * USB port 
 * CD-ROM drive

PACKAGE CONTENTS
 * Logitech® G15 Keyboard 
 * Palm rest 
 * Software CD 
 * Installation Guide 
 * 1-year limited hardware warranty
feature_bullets: Intelligent cable management: Keep mouse, headset, and other cords out of the way by routing them through channels on the underside of the keyboard
Illuminated characters allow you to play late into the night
Create useful macros on the fly and play them back with a single press of a G-key
With the Logitech-exclusive GamePanel LCD, you can easily find out what server your friends are using to play Battlefield 2142
Package Contents: Logitech G15 Keyboard, Palm rest, Software CD, Installation Guide and 1-year limited hardware warranty
